oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Research Program for Organic Food and Farming in Finland
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Farming Systems
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Finnish Ministry of Agriculture and Forestry started a three-year Research Programme on Organic Food and Farming in 2003. The programme consists of 15 projects on different themes covering the whole food chain and has an annual budget of about 2.2 MEUR. All ongoing projects on organic food and farming in Finland can be found at the web site http://www.agronet.fi/luotu/eng/index.htm
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: { Programme part} Luomuohjelma: Research Program for Organic Food and Farming in Finland. [Luomututkimusohjelma 2003-2005.] Runs 2003 - 2004. Programme Leader(s): J채rvenp채채, Markku and Nyk채nen, Arja.
